title: sadguru nAthA
sahitya:
sadguru nAthA sangIta dAyakA santatamuga nEnu smarimpudunayya


anupallavi

  vidvanmaNi kula vijita pratApA padma vibhUSaNA parama krpAguNA


caraNam    adbhuta sangItam AsatOnErpina satkavi tilakmI sadrshamevarayya
bhaktitO pADitini palukulO sundarA kIrtini dayajEsE gAna sudhAkara
